information: All Amounts related to price or cost are in Rands (ZAR)

/pay./paymentNotify: Used to Notify Mini App of Payment Completion [POST]

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Tasting Menu at {index} [GET]
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Tasting Menu [GET]

/a-la-carte-menu./: Returns A La Carte Menu Data [GET]

/starters./: Returns the Starters subsection of the A La Carte Menu [GET]

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Starters at {index} [GET]
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Starters [GET]

/mains./: Returns the Mains subsection of the A La Carte Menu [GET]

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Mains at {index} [GET]
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Mains [GET]

/desserts./: Returns the Desserts subsection of the A La Carte Menu [GET]

/{index}./: Returns the respective element of Desserts at {index} [GET]
/{index}./{arg}: Returns the property {arg} at {index} of Desserts [GET]
